header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Drugs, uni work, seminars, life, chocolate, moving in, new house, where we live
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, requesting

yeah that's what I just said you just shouted out horny

what is your job then? I didn't know that
am I allowed to record you? cos if not I'm gonna press stop
no of course you can record me
okay thank you erm right so basically what I do is I record erm conversations that I have with people
well about anything and it basically gets analysed so when I fill the forms in I'll put in where you're from and stuff like that and you've got to sign the forms as well by the way

so erm so basically what they do is they analyse different dialects and different use of language and how you use your mouth to pronounce things and different words that you use that I don't way like I say I say fings you say things so differences like that

use hangers are you it's towels innit?
